sentences.en: Brawny: Used to describe wines that are hard, intense, tannic and that have raw , woody flavors.
sentences.cn: 强壮的: 用于形容葡萄酒坚硬, 强烈, 单宁明鲜且具有生的, 木头风味.

sentences.en: Filling the Chinese galls in copper container , extract tannic acid by water with pressurized metering pump.
sentences.cn: 将五倍子装于铜制耐压容器中,以加压计量泵用水循环提取其中的单宁.

sentences.en: Gargle and clean your teeth after eating persimmon lest the tannic acid, pectin and sugar damage your teeth.
sentences.cn: 吃完柿子记得刷牙漱口，以免柿子中的单宁酸、果胶和糖分，侵蚀牙齿。

sentences.en: It is the tannic acid contained in oak that ages the brandy.
sentences.cn: 正是栎木里含的丹宁酸使白兰地变芳醇了.

sentences.en: Nice ruby color. Full, robust , with a good tannic structure.
sentences.cn: 红宝石般的色泽, 酒体丰满, 结构平和,口感复合,余味绵长.

sentences.en: Not shy on muscle or tannic backbone.
sentences.cn: 酒质及单宁较为醇厚,耐人寻味.

sentences.en: Objective: Compare tannic contents of Tangkuei head, body and tail.
sentences.cn: 目的: 比较当归头 、 身、尾的鞣质含量.

sentences.en: Puckery: Describes highly tannic and very dry wines.
sentences.cn: 干涩的: 形容单宁强且非常干的葡萄酒.

sentences.en: Raw wines are often tannic and high in alcohol or acidity.
sentences.cn: 生的葡萄酒通常是高单宁且高酒精或高酸度.

sentences.en: Result: The total effect of the new tannic acid ointment was 100 %.
sentences.cn: 结果: 新鞣酸软膏对尿布性皮炎患儿有效率为100%.

sentences.en: Tannometers: Used to determine the tannic acid concentration of tanning solution.
sentences.cn: 制革计: 测定制革溶液单宁酸的浓度之用.

sentences.en: The most obvious characteristics are tannic acid.
sentences.cn: 最明显的特色是单宁酸.

sentences.en: The sincere tasty tannic acid symbolized this liquor completely brews maturely.
sentences.cn: 淳厚爽口的丹宁酸标志着此酒完全酿造成熟.

sentences.en: The tannic acid containing organic substances such as a base convergence, pectin content can absorb toxins.
sentences.cn: 其中含有的鞣酸、有机碱等物质具有收敛作用, 所含果胶可吸收毒素.

sentences.en: The wine from C & ocirc ; tes de Bourg is quite tannic with strong aromas of red fruits.
sentences.cn: 波尔 山坡 的葡萄酒就着强烈的果香而且收缩感强.

sentences.en: Why the oak barrel has magical efficacy Oak contains tannic a cid.
sentences.cn: 橡木酒桶神奇的功效:橡木中含有单宁,木质素,半纤维素等物质;并且具有独特的透气性.

words.tran_cn: 制革；制革法；皮肤晒成褐色
鞣革；把…晒黑；鞭笞（tan的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: of, relating to, containing, or produced from tan, tannin, or tannic acid
